title: SKILLS ENHANCEMENT TRAINING COURSE
subtitle: KHÓA HUẤN LUYỆN NÂNG CAO KỸ NĂNG CHO HUYNH TRƯỞNG
description:
An intensive three-day training course designed to enhance the leadership and teaching skills of Buddhist Youth Scout leaders. This comprehensive program covers essential topics including youth psychology, effective communication, conflict resolution, and innovative teaching methods.

Experienced instructors will guide participants through interactive workshops, role-playing exercises, and group discussions to develop practical skills for leading youth programs with confidence and compassion.
